article.title: Odd-parity superconductivity in bilayer transition metal dichalcogenides

multiple_choice_question.text: Which of the following panels shows the top view of the 2H stacking structure?
In which stacking structure is the PDW state more stable?
At which point in the Brillouin zone does the interlayer hybridization function,  f₁(k), disappear?
Which of the following superconducting states is most stable in the intercalated bilayer MoS2 under a parallel magnetic field at low temperatures?
What type of superconducting state emerges in the presence of a large Rashba-type ASOC and the orbital effect?
